titleStmt.title: The present state of affairs in Ireland being a full and distinct relation of the condition of the Irish army; : of the miscarriages of the French officers; : and of several other remarkable things relating to Dublin. : In a letter from Chester, of February 5. from some persons lately arrived from Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Williams in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church Library, Oxford, England.
